p: Litsea cubeba oil inhalation produced a reduction in brain wave powers at the 1:1,000, 1:400, 1:100, and undiluted dilutions. For lower concentrations—the 1:1,000 and 1:400 dilutions—theta, alpha, and beta wave powers were reduced compared with the control. The alpha and beta wave powers were decreased with the 1:100 and undiluted dilution ( Figure 1). For the 1:1000 dilution, the slow alpha wave power was especially decreased in the frontal region of the brain. The beta wave power in the range of low beta and mid beta wave power was decreased during Litsea cubeba oil inhalation.
